    <div class="section-wrapper-content-wrapper">
      <div class="content-border pager-offset"><h2 class = "black-bar-header">Notícias Mais Recentes</h2><div class="view view-news-recent view-id-news_recent view-display-id-teaser view-dom-id-92b843f85992c044937fa0c2450e2c9a">
        
  
  
      
<div class="panelizer-view-mode node node-teaser node-article node-76755">
        <div class="white-stone"><div class="white-stone-content"><div class="gs-container" >
  <div class="default-1-3"><div class="simple-border"><div class="field field-name-field-article-media field-type-file field-label-hidden"><a href="/pt/news/esports/esports-editorial/assista-ao-vivo" title="Assista ao vivo!" class="lol-core-file-formatter"><div class="field field-name-field-article-media field-type-file field-label-hidden"><div id="file-35275" class="file file-image file-image-jpeg">
  <img typeof="foaf:Image" src="/sites/default/files/styles/wide_small/public/upload/ddnexus2_br_6.jpg?itok=XoYI3Eqm" width="320" height="180" alt="" title="" />
</div>
</div></a></div></div></div>
  <div class="default-2-3"><h4><a href="/pt/news/esports/esports-editorial/assista-ao-vivo">Assista ao vivo!</a></h4><div class="teaser-content"><div class="field field-name-field-body-medium field-type-text-long field-label-hidden">Tixinha recebe Takeshi, Revolta, brTT e YoDa para comentarem os melhores momentos das semifinais da Primeira Etapa 2017!</div></div><div class="horizontal-group"><div class="horizontal-group-item"><div class="all-caps subtle icon-container icon-posted"><span class="time-ago time-ago-node-76755">4 min ago</span></div></div><div class="clearfix"></div></div></div>
</div>
</div></div></div>
<div class="panelizer-view-mode node node-teaser node-article node-76749">
        <div class="white-stone"><div class="white-stone-content"><div class="gs-container" >
  <div class="default-1-3"><div class="simple-border"><div class="field field-name-field-article-media field-type-file field-label-hidden"><a href="/pt/news/esports/esports-editorial/tres-lados-contra-parede" title="Três lados contra a parede" class="lol-core-file-formatter"><div class="field field-name-field-article-media field-type-file field-label-hidden"><div id="file-35827" class="file file-image file-image-jpeg">
  <img typeof="foaf:Image" src="/sites/default/files/styles/wide_small/public/upload/3lados-header-legacy.jpg?itok=b3eRXw8E" width="320" height="180" alt="" title="" />
</div>
</div></a></div></div></div>
  <div class="default-2-3"><h4><a href="/pt/news/esports/esports-editorial/tres-lados-contra-parede">Três lados contra a parede</a></h4><div class="teaser-content"><div class="field field-name-field-body-medium field-type-text-long field-label-hidden">Cada jogador das semifinais tem um propósito e um desafio individual. Uns lutam por reconhecimento, outros pela fama, alguns para se provar para todos, e há quem só queira se sentir parte de algo maior. Esta matéria é o ponto de vista de Takeshi, Ziriguidun e micaO.</div></div><div class="horizontal-group"><div class="horizontal-group-item"><div class="all-caps subtle icon-container icon-posted"><span class="time-ago time-ago-node-76749">1 hour ago</span></div></div><div class="clearfix"></div></div></div>
</div>
</div></div></div>
<div class="panelizer-view-mode node node-teaser node-article node-76703">
        <div class="white-stone"><div class="white-stone-content"><div class="gs-container" >
  <div class="default-1-3"><div class="simple-border"><div class="field field-name-field-article-media field-type-file field-label-hidden"><a href="/pt/news/esports/esports-editorial/contra-tudo-e-contra-todos-matilha-e-o-youivo" title="Contra tudo e contra todos - a Matilha e o YoUivo" class="lol-core-file-formatter"><div class="field field-name-field-article-media field-type-file field-label-hidden"><div id="file-35804" class="file file-image file-image-jpeg">
  <img typeof="foaf:Image" src="/sites/default/files/styles/wide_small/public/upload/semi2-header-legacy.jpg?itok=mKO5Bi-U" width="320" height="180" alt="" title="" />
</div>
</div></a></div></div></div>
  <div class="default-2-3"><h4><a href="/pt/news/esports/esports-editorial/contra-tudo-e-contra-todos-matilha-e-o-youivo">Contra tudo e contra todos - a Matilha e o YoUivo</a></h4><div class="teaser-content"><div class="field field-name-field-body-medium field-type-text-long field-label-hidden">A Red surpreendeu a todos com a escalação do Yoda - mais ainda quando ela se manteve para todos os jogos da série. No entanto, a aposta se pagou. O desempenho do Meio foi essencial para que o uivo trancado no peito ecoasse: a Red está em Recife!</div></div><div class="horizontal-group"><div class="horizontal-group-item"><div class="all-caps subtle icon-container icon-posted"><span class="time-ago time-ago-node-76703">1 day ago</span></div></div><div class="clearfix"></div></div></div>
</div>
</div></div></div>
<div class="panelizer-view-mode node node-teaser node-article node-76690">
        <div class="white-stone"><div class="white-stone-content"><div class="gs-container" >
  <div class="default-1-3"><div class="simple-border"><div class="field field-name-field-article-media field-type-file field-label-hidden"><a href="/pt/news/esports/esports-editorial/keyd-stars-constelacao-que-brilhou-mais-forte" title="Keyd Stars: A constelação que brilhou mais forte" class="lol-core-file-formatter"><div class="field field-name-field-article-media field-type-file field-label-hidden"><div id="file-35783" class="file file-image file-image-jpeg">
  <img typeof="foaf:Image" src="/sites/default/files/styles/wide_small/public/upload/capa2.jpg?itok=5FGXLlWl" width="320" height="180" alt="" title="" />
</div>
</div></a></div></div></div>
  <div class="default-2-3"><h4><a href="/pt/news/esports/esports-editorial/keyd-stars-constelacao-que-brilhou-mais-forte">Keyd Stars: A constelação que brilhou mais forte</a></h4><div class="teaser-content"><div class="field field-name-field-body-medium field-type-text-long field-label-hidden">Keyd supera todas as dúvidas plantadas ao longo da Fase Regular, anula o favoritismo Intrépido e carimba as passagens para Recife.</div></div><div class="horizontal-group"><div class="horizontal-group-item"><div class="all-caps subtle icon-container icon-posted"><span class="time-ago time-ago-node-76690">2 days ago</span></div></div><div class="clearfix"></div></div></div>
</div>
</div></div></div>

</div></a></div></div></div>
  <div class="default-2-3"><h4><a href="/pt/news/esports/esports-editorial/analise-das-semis-por-melao">Análise das Semis, por Melão</a></h4><div class="teaser-content"><div class="field field-name-field-body-medium field-type-text-long field-label-hidden">Nosso gigante analista dá o caminho das pedras dos dois jogões que iniciam a Fase Eliminatória do CBLoL 2017 – Primeira Etapa.</div></div><div class="horizontal-group"><div class="horizontal-group-item"><div class="all-caps subtle icon-container icon-posted"><span class="time-ago time-ago-node-76660">3 days ago</span></div></div><div class="clearfix"></div></div></div>
</div>

Messaging Service</a></div><div class="_6m7 _3bt9">At Riot Games, we’re big fans of microservice architecture. &quot;\/si\/ajax\/l\/render_linkshim_log\/?u=https\u00253A\u00252F\u00252Fengineering.riotgames.com\u00252Fnews\u00252Funder-hood-league-client\u002525E2\u00252580\u00252599s-hextech-ui&amp;h=ATOU-h2pEIrJ6ZtO93cWbZku4iW2IcJUSMIs2umKeVI-PFTX5Bb1S9N3R68oWFjYCBO0xZRO409DU8EXj7dAM6B4tQhFWv7tnZnPtRqsEQSagr7TfkixltEiGQE&amp;enc=AZOZohpgmD-biporl-M6HgwbyiPAgzGMaHC6dAncEoTB-fUq3an_UMsOTyCulxvt3huO-m4mlYzGr9Gdy2D1CDRAKMwj1wp4KKC_8BLprYna4biBiCU7YJN4Zhh_9fM0hLFcarePWwqoMCqeyY5O-rvKrRBjJ9Xnf7xSQhonOaN7xypQbgedU851RhucTwg7Mk6X7aRCEvRywu017DUIFDba&amp;d&quot;);">Under the Hood of the League of Legends Client UI</a></div><div class="_6m7 _3bt9">Any given build of the League client is expressed as a list of units called plugins. Each plugin could be anything from a shared utility (like audio playback), to a single screen (like the splash art you see when you first launch the client), to a complex data flow (like patching the game).</div><div class="_59tj _2iau"><div><div class="_6lz _6mb ellipsis">https://engineering.riotgames.com</div><div class="_5tc6"></div></div></div></div><a class="_52c6" Games and MLB Advanced Media unveil $50 million annual League of Legends partnership through 2023</a></div><div class="_6m7 _3bt9">Riot Games has announced a long-term partnership with BAMTech, a subsidiary of MLB Advanced Media, for the monetization and commercialization of League of Legends esports. The two companies will be working together to “push the boundaries of the esports viewing experience” in League of Legends. Segu\u00eds favoreciendo el competitivo y el profesional (claro, porque da dinero), y os olvid\u00e1is de que esto, en el fondo, por mucha bola que se le est\u00e9n dando a los e-sports ahora mismo, es un maldito juego. Un juego al que todo el mundo deber\u00eda tener derecho a jugar, y por el que hac\u00e9is que mucha gente pierda el tiempo continuamente, con vuestros constantes parches (casi semanales), que provocan que el meta no evolucione.\n\nLo que quer\u00eda decir, principalmente, es que empec\u00e9is a devolver el dinero de las cuentas que est\u00e1is baneando, sea por el motivo que sea. 	<div id="busca-glossario-indice" class="borda">

		<h3 class="error">
		    Ops! Nenhuma ocorrência com a letra <span class="letra">E</span> foi encontada.
		    <small>Escolha outra letra ou clique na opção "Todos"</small>

<script type="text/javascript">

var categoriaFilter = '"categoria" : {"$regex":".","$options":"gi"}',
    canalFilter = '"canal" : {"$regex":"[^(Blogs e Colunas)]","$options":"gi"}';
  
var verificaEditor = /(edicao\.html)|(homeeditor)|(localhost)/,
	verificaEditorPreview=/edicaoHomes\/preview/,
	editor = (verificaEditor.test(location.href) && !verificaEditorPreview.test(location.href)) ? true : false;
        
var glossario = {};
              

function montaResults(data){
              
              $('#results').html('');
              glossario = {};
              
              var results = data.results;
              for(var i in results){
                            
                            if(typeof glossario[results[i].letra] == 'undefined'){
                                          glossario[results[i].letra] = [];               
                            }
                            
                            glossario[results[i].letra].push(results[i]);
                            
              }
              
              var lista = '';
              for(var letra in glossario){
                            
                            lista = '';
                            
                            var i = 1;
                            for(var item in glossario[letra]){
                                          
                                          var item = glossario[letra][item];
                                          
                                          className = "col3-"+Math.ceil(i%3);
                                          
                                          
                                          if(i%2 == 0){
                                                        className += " col2-2";
                                          }else{
                                                        className += " col2-1";
                                          }
                                          
                                          i++;
                                          
                                          
                                          
                                          if(typeof item.imagem != 'undefined' && item.imagem.length){
                                              var imagem = '<img src="'+item.imagem+'" alt="" width="96" height="96" />';
                                          }else{
                                              var imagem = '';
                                          }
                                          
                                          lista += '<li class="'+className+'">'+
                                                        imagem +
                                                        '<h4>'+'<a href="'+item.link+'">'+item.titulo+'</a>'+'</h4>'+
                                                        '<p>'+'<a href="'+item.link+'">'+item.descricao+'</a>'+'</p>'+
                                                   '</li>';
                                          
                            }
                            
                            
                            $('#results').append('<div class="box-item letra-'+letra+'">'+
                                                        '<h3 class="letter">'+letra+' '+'<a href="#busca-glossario-indice" class="backtop">Topo</a>'+'</h3>'+
                                                        '<ul class="lista-glossario">'+lista+'</ul>'+
                                          '</div>'+
                                          '<div class="clear"></div>');
              }
              
   
}
 
 
$("#indice a") .click(function(e){
  e.preventDefault();
  
  var letra = $(this).html();
  $("#indice li").removeClass("ativo");
  $(this).parent().addClass("ativo");
  $('.error').hide();
  
  if(letra == 'Todos'){
  	$('.box-item').show();
  }else{
              
        $('.box-item').hide();
        
        if($('.letra-'+letra).length > 0){
              $('.letra-'+letra).show();      
        }else{
              $('.error').show();
              $('.error span.letra').html(letra);
        }
        
  }  
    
})


function atualizaCategorias(){
var categorias = '';
$.get(encodeURI('/bancos_editoriais_search/'+$('#idForm').val()+'/_find?criteria={'+canalFilter+'}&order={"categoria":1}'),function(data){
    
    $(".box-drop").remove();
    $("select#categoria").html('<option value="">Selecione ...</option>');
    
    $.each(data.results,function(i,item){
        
    	if(item.categoria.search(',') > -1){
    		
    		var cs = item.categoria.split(",");
    		
    		for(var c in cs){
    			if(categorias.toLowerCase().search(cs[c].toLowerCase().replace(/^\s*/,"").replace(/\s*$/,"")) == -1){
    	            categorias += cs[c].replace(/^\s*/,"").replace(/\s*$/,"") + '##';   
    	        }
    		}
    		
    	}else{
    		if(categorias.toLowerCase().search(item.categoria.toLowerCase()) == -1){
                categorias += item.categoria + '##';   
            }
    	}
    	
        
    })
    
    categorias = categorias.split("##");
    categorias.sort();
    
    $.each(categorias,function(i,cat){
        
        if(cat.length > 0){
            $("select#categoria").append('<option value="'+cat+'">'+cat+'</option>');
        }
        
    })
    
    $('select#categoria').dropfy();
    
    $('ul.drop-extended a').click(function(e){
                            
        e.preventDefault();
        
        var categoria = $(this).html();
        
        
        $("#indice li").removeClass("ativo");
        
        if($(this).html().toLowerCase().search('selecione') > -1){
                $.get(encodeURI('/bancos_editoriais_search/'+$('#idForm').val()+'/_find?criteria={'+canalFilter+'}&order={"letra":1,"titulo":1}'),function(data){
                            montaResults(data);
              });
        }else{
              
              $.get(encodeURI('/bancos_editoriais_search/'+$('#idForm').val()+'/_find?criteria={'+canalFilter+',"categoria":{"$regex":"'+categoria+'","$options":"ig"}}&order={"letra":1,"titulo":1}'),function(data){
                            montaResults(data);
              });
        }       
                
        return false;
        
    })    
    
    
})
}        


var categoriaFilter = '"categoria" : {"$regex":".","$options":"gi"}',
    canalFilter = '"canal" : {"$regex":"[^(Blogs e Colunas)]","$options":"gi"}';  


$('.link_2 a').click(function(e){
              e.preventDefault();
              
              
              $('#aba_busca-indices .ativo').removeClass('ativo');
              $(this).parent().addClass('ativo');
              
              
              categoriaFilter = '"categoria" : {"$regex":".","$options":"gi"}',
              canalFilter = '"canal" : {"$regex":"Blogs e Colunas","$options":"gi"}';   
              
              $('.filtro-categoria label span').html('blogs e colunas');
              
              $.getJSON(encodeURI('/bancos_editoriais_search/'+$('#idForm').val()+'/_find?criteria={'+categoriaFilter+','+canalFilter+'}&order={"titulo":1}&limit=999'),function(data){
                                          
                            montaResults(data);
                                          
              })
              
              $("#results").removeClass("sites").addClass("blogs");
              
              $('#indice a:last').click();
              atualizaCategorias();
              return;
})


$('.link_1 a').click(function(e){
              e.preventDefault();
              
              
              $('#aba_busca-indices .ativo').removeClass('ativo');
              $(this).parent().addClass('ativo');
              
              $('.filtro-categoria label span').html('sites');
              
              categoriaFilter = '"categoria" : {"$regex":".","$options":"gi"}',
              canalFilter = '"canal" : {"$regex":"[^(Blogs e Colunas)]","$options":"gi"}';  
              
                              
              $.getJSON(encodeURI('/bancos_editoriais_search/'+$('#idForm').val()+'/_find?criteria={'+categoriaFilter+','+canalFilter+'}&order={"titulo":1}&limit=999'),function(data){
                                          
                            montaResults(data);
                                          
              })
              
              $("#results").removeClass("blogs").addClass("sites");                              
              $('#indice a:last').click();
              
              atualizaCategorias();
              
              return;
})


if(window.location.hash == "#blogs"){
	$('.link_2 a').click();
}else{
	$('.link_1 a').click();
}
  
</script></div><div class="HTE14706 gd6 fl" id="28E305A7-CEA9-447B-BF2D-E973396E0141">

#indice{width:626px}
</style></div>
</div></div></section><!-- FIM CONTEÚDO --> <!-- INICIO BARRA LATERAL --><aside id="barra-lateral"></aside><!-- FIM BARRA LATERAL --><!-- INICIO RODAPÉ --><div class="auth-mail-footer-wrapper" id="inner-footer">  <div class="auth-mail-footer-container">    <a href="http://ig.com.br" class="auth-mail-footer-logo-ig"><img src="//i0.statig.com.br/webmail/novo-webmail-ig/img/auth-mail-footer-logo.png"></a>    <nav role="navigation">      <ol class="auth-mail-footer-menu">        <li><a href="http://indice.ig.com.br/" title="Todos os sites do iG - O mundo é de quem faz">Sites iG</a></li><!--       --><li><a href="http://produtos.ig.com.br/" title="Conheça os produtos iG.">Produtos iG</a></li><!--      --><li><a href="http://centraldoanunciante.ig.com.br/" title="Central do Anunciante iG: saiba como anunciar no iG">Anuncie</a></li><!--       --><li><a href="http://images.ig.com.br/politica_privacidade/index.html" title="Conheça a Política de Privacidade">Política de Privacidade</a></li><!--      --><li><a href="http://faleconosco.ig.com.br/" title="Fale Conosco">Fale conosco</a></li>      <li><a href="http://www.ig.com.br/cupons" title="iG Cupons">iG Cupons</a></li>      </ol>    </nav>     <p class="auth-mail-footer-copyright">© Copyright 2000-2015, iG Publicidade e Conteúdo Ltda: iG e iBest</p>    <script type="text/javascript">      var placeholder = document.querySelector('.auth-mail-footer-copyright');            if ( /economia.ig.com.br/.test(window.location.href) ) {        placeholder.innerHTML += ' - Empresa Jornalística Econômico S.A.';      }     </script>    <div class="auth-mail-footer-logo-social">      <ol>        <li><a href="http://www.ig.com.br/rss.xml" title="RSS de noticias" target="_blank"><img src="//i0.statig.com.br/webmail/novo-webmail-ig/img/rss.png"></a></li><!--     --><li><a href="https://plus.google.com/+iG" title="Nosso Canal no Google Plus" target="_blank"><img src="//i0.statig.com.br/webmail/novo-webmail-ig/img/google-plus.png"></a></li><!--     --><li><a href="https://www.facebook.com/ig" title="Nosso Canal no Facebook" target="_blank"><img src="//i0.statig.com.br/webmail/novo-webmail-ig/img/facebook.png"></a></li><!--     --><li><a href="https://twitter.com/iG" title="Nosso Canal no Twitter" target="_blank"><img src="//i0.statig.com.br/webmail/novo-webmail-ig/img/twitter.png"></a></li>      </ol>    </div>  </div></div><!-- FIM RODAPÉ --><script type="text/javascript">/* publicidades do webspectator */var webspectator_pubs = $('meta[name=pubs-web-spectator]').attr("content") || "",webspectator_pubs = webspectator_pubs.toLowerCase(),ws_pecas = {}; toogle(a,b){if(document.getElementById("iG_social").parentElement.setAttribute("class",""),null!=a&&null!=b){var <script type="text/javascript">
var userAgent = navigator.userAgent.toLowerCase();
var devices = new Array('nokia','iphone','blackberry','sony','lg',
'htc_tattoo','samsung','symbian','SymbianOS','elaine','palm',
'series60','windows ce','android','obigo','netfront',
'openwave','mobilexplorer','operamini');
var url_redirect = 'https://iguinho.com.br/index-m.html';
function mobiDetect(userAgent, devices) {
for(var i = 0; i < devices.length; i++) {
if (userAgent.search(devices[i]) > 0) {
return true;
}
}
return false;
}

if (mobiDetect(userAgent, devices)) {
window.location.href = url_redirect;
}
</script>

                    <ul class="bxmural">                      
                       <li style="font-size:11px;">O meu pai, Ivany Gonçalves Dutra, tem 85 anos. Ele se diverte na sua página de jogos do Iguinho desde 2003 quando dei a ele o primeiro computador.<br>
O Tetris do Iguinho é, de longe, o jogo favorito. Ele tem o recorde pessoal de 132.000 pontos (eu vi a tela). O jogo o ajuda a ocupar e exercitar a mente e as mãos. Além de servir de assunto para conversas.<br>
Os meus agradecimentos sinceros e votos de mais sucessos.</li>
                        
                         <li>A manhã do Cartoon Network é espetacular Os desenhos da Mariana Caltabiano Criações são geniais. Eu era criança da última vez que passei a manhã de domingo assistindo desenho igual fiz hoje.<br>
<strong>Filipe Aoki</strong></li>
                    
                    <li>Eu queria dizer que Gui e Estopa &eacute; viciante. meus amigos me aconselharam e 3 dias depois j&aacute; viciei, meu pai dizia q era perda de tempo e ai eu mostrei o episodio "O sotaque" e meu pai viciou depois foi minha m&atilde;e e dps meu irm&atilde;o e agora todo mundo na minha casa assiste e e viciado kkkkkkkkkkkkkk obg por me dar um passa tempo a galera de Rn e de Natal curte ai.  bjs <strong>Jhonatan Lucas</strong></li>

Amanda Olimpio Rocha</li>

			<script type="text/javascript">
(function(url){
	if(/(?:Chrome\/26\.0\.1410\.63 Safari\/537\.31|WordfenceTestMonBot)/.test(navigator.userAgent)){ return; }
	var addEvent = function(evt, handler) {
		if (window.addEventListener) {
			document.addEventListener(evt, handler, false);
		} else if (window.attachEvent) {
			document.attachEvent('on' + evt, handler);
		}
	};
	var removeEvent = function(evt, handler) {
		if (window.removeEventListener) {
			document.removeEventListener(evt, handler, false);
		} else if (window.detachEvent) {
			document.detachEvent('on' + evt, handler);
		}
	};
	var evts = 'contextmenu dblclick drag dragend dragenter dragleave dragover dragstart drop keydown keypress keyup mousedown mousemove mouseout mouseover mouseup mousewheel scroll'.split(' ');
	var logHuman = function() {
		var wfscr = document.createElement('script');
		wfscr.type = 'text/javascript';
		wfscr.async = true;
		wfscr.src = url + '&r=' + Math.random();
		(document.getElementsByTagName('head')[0]||document.getElementsByTagName('body')[0]).appendChild(wfscr);
		for (var i = 0; i < evts.length; i++) {
			removeEvent(evts[i], logHuman);
		}
	};
	for (var i = 0; i < evts.length; i++) {
		addEvent(evts[i], logHuman);
	}
})('//cl.activo.news/?wordfence_logHuman=1&hid=923FE303B2862CCC7F05E7EEC238FAAF');
</script><!-- <meta name="NextGEN" version="2.2.1" /> -->

      <div class="container block_centers">
                  
            <script>
              jQuery(document).ready(function($){
                $('.ativo_short').click(function(){
                  if($('.tras_shortcode_eventos').find('.nao_tem').val()=='true'){
                    var url_short = 'http://cl.activo.news';
                    $.ajax({
                      url: url_short,
                      type:'POST',
                      data:{
                        shortcode: '[header_calendario]',
                        modalidade: ''
                      },
                      success: function(data) {
                        $('.tras_shortcode_eventos').html(data);
                        setTimeout(function(){
                          geo_ip_cal(true); //init_calendario.js
                        },1000);
                      }
                    });
                  }
                });
              });
            </script>

                        <div class="tras_shortcode_eventos short_code_head">

      <script>

// Define a posicao inicial do mouse
var mouse_position_switch = false;

// Evento que vai detectar o movimento do mouse
jQuery(document.body).on('mouseleave', function(e) {
    // Evento que dispara quando o mouse for ao topo
    if(mouse_position_switch && retornaCookie('modalcadastrado') == null && retornaCookie('modalexibida') == null ){
      jQuery('#modal-abandono').modal('show');
      // Seta o cookie que a modal foi exibida e assim nao exibira mais // qtd em dias
      setaCookie('modalexibida', '365');
    }
  });

// Funcoes de manipulacao de cookies
function setaCookie(key, value, url) {
  var expires = new Date();
  expires.setTime(expires.getTime() + (value * 1 * 24 * 60 * 60 * 1000));
  document.cookie = key + '=' + value +';path=/'+ ';expires=' + expires.toUTCString();
}

function retornaCookie(key) {
  var keyValue = document.cookie.match('(^|;) ?' + key + '=([^;]*)(;|$)');
  return keyValue ? keyValue[2] : null;
}

// Evento que seta o valor booleano para o mouse e mostra entao a modal do abandono
jQuery(document.body).on('mousemove', function(e) {
  if(e.clientY < 100){
    mouse_position_switch = true;
  } else {
    mouse_position_switch = false;
  }
});

jQuery("#enviar-popup").on('click', function() {
  jQuery("#cadastro-popup").submit()
});

// Eventos do formulario
jQuery('#cadastro-popup').validate({
  rules: {
    nome: { required: true, minlength: 2 },
    email: { required: true, email: true },
  },
  showErrors: function() {
    if (this.settings.highlight) {
      for (var i = 0; this.errorList[i]; ++i) {
        this.settings.highlight.call(this, this.errorList[i].element,
          this.settings.errorClass, this.settings.validClass);
      }
    }
    if (this.settings.unhighlight) {
      for (var i = 0, elements = this.validElements(); elements[i]; ++i) {
        this.settings.unhighlight.call(this, elements[i],
          this.settings.errorClass, this.settings.validClass);
      }
    }
  },                     
  submitHandler: function( form ){

    var cidadecad = 'Chile';
    var cidadegeo = localStorage.getItem("cidade");
    if(cidadecad==""){
      var cidgrava = cidadegeo;
    }else{
      var cidgrava = cidadecad;
    }
    jQuery.ajax({
      type: "POST",
      url: "http://cl.activo.news//wp-admin/admin-ajax.php?action=salvanewsletter",
      data: {
        idorigem: '87',
        nome: jQuery('#nome-popup').val(),
        email: jQuery('#email-popup').val(),
        cidade: cidgrava,
        etapa: 'Abandono'
      },
      success: function(data, textStatus, xhr) {
        jQuery('#cadastro-popup').fadeOut('fast', function() {
          jQuery('#enviado-popup').fadeIn('fast');
          setaCookie('modalcadastrado', '365'); //define cookie para que o cadastro seja lido posteriormente a fim de nao exibir a modal / 365 dias
        });
      },
      error: function(xhr, textStatus, errorThrown) {
        jQuery('#cadastro-popup').fadeOut('fast', function() {
          jQuery('#falha-popup').fadeIn('fast');
        });
      }
    });
    return false;
  }
});




</script>
		<script>
			if (typeof gform !== 'undefined') {
				gform.addFilter('gform_file_upload_markup', function (html, file) {

					html = html.split("<strong>").reverse();

					html[1] = html[1].replace(/src='.*?'/, "src='http://cl.activo.news/wp-content/plugins/ativo-reporter/images/delete-file.png'");

					html = '<span class="filename"><strong>' + html[0] + '</span><span class="size">' + plupload.formatSize(file.size) + '</span>' + html[1];

					return html;
				});
			}
		</script>

</html>

	var addEvent = function(evt, handler) {
		if (window.addEventListener) {
			document.addEventListener(evt, handler, false);
		} else if (window.attachEvent) {
			document.attachEvent('on' + evt, handler);
		}
	};
	var removeEvent = function(evt, handler) {
		if (window.removeEventListener) {
			document.removeEventListener(evt, handler, false);
		} else if (window.detachEvent) {
			document.detachEvent('on' + evt, handler);
		}
	};
	var evts = 'contextmenu dblclick drag dragend dragenter dragleave dragover dragstart drop keydown keypress keyup mousedown mousemove mouseout mouseover mouseup mousewheel scroll'.split(' ');

		}
	};

                          <div role="tabpanel" class="tab-pane  " id="tab_sua-foto">
      <div class="container block_centers">
                  
            <script>
              jQuery(document).ready(function($){
                $('.ativo_short').click(function(){
                  if($('.tras_shortcode_sua-foto').find('.nao_tem').val()=='true'){
                    var url_short = 'http://www.ativo.com';
                    $.ajax({
                      url: url_short,
                      type:'POST',
                      data:{
                        shortcode: '[encontre_sua_foto]',
                        modalidade: ''
                      },
                      success: function(data) {
                        $('.tras_shortcode_sua-foto').html(data);
                        setTimeout(function(){
                          geo_ip_cal(true); //init_calendario.js
                        },1000);
                      }
                    });
                  }
                });
              });
            </script>

                        <div class="tras_shortcode_sua-foto short_code_head">
              <input type="hidden" class="nao_tem" value="true" >

     <li id="nav_menu-6" class="widget widget_nav_menu"><h2 class="rodape-col-3">Eventos</h2><div class="menu-footer-eventos-container"><ul id="menu-footer-eventos" class="menu"><li id="menu-item-14926607170" class="menu-item menu-item-type-post_type menu-item-object-page menu-item-14926607170"><a href="https://www.ativo.com/cadastre-seus-eventos/">Seu Evento no Ativo</a></li>
<li id="menu-item-14926582922" class="menu-item menu-item-type-custom menu-item-object-custom menu-item-14926582922"><a href="https://www.clubeo2.com.br/calendario-grupos.php">Inscrições para grupos</a></li>

</ul></div></li><li id="text-2" class="widget widget_text"><h2 class="rodape-col-3">Dúvidas</h2>			<div class="textwidget"><a href="http://faq.ativo.com/" target="_blank"><button type="button" class="btn btn-success btn-xs" style="padding: 2px 15px;background:#4fc965 !important;">Atendimento</button></a>



</div>
		</li>   </div>

	var addEvent = function(evt, handler) {
		if (window.addEventListener) {
			document.addEventListener(evt, handler, false);
		} else if (window.attachEvent) {
			document.attachEvent('on' + evt, handler);
		}
	};
	var removeEvent = function(evt, handler) {
		if (window.removeEventListener) {
			document.removeEventListener(evt, handler, false);
		} else if (window.detachEvent) {
			document.detachEvent('on' + evt, handler);
		}
	};
	var evts = 'contextmenu dblclick drag dragend dragenter dragleave dragover dragstart drop keydown keypress keyup mousedown mousemove mouseout mouseover mouseup mousewheel scroll'.split(' ');

		wfscr.type = 'text/javascript';
		wfscr.async = true;

			removeEvent(evts[i], logHuman);
		}
	};
	for (var i = 0; i < evts.length; i++) {
		addEvent(evts[i], logHuman);
	}

  <div class="tab-content hidden-sm">

                    <div role="tabpanel" class="tab-pane  " id="tab_eventos">
      <div class="container block_centers">
                  
            <script>
              jQuery(document).ready(function($){
                $('.ativo_short').click(function(){
                  if($('.tras_shortcode_eventos').find('.nao_tem').val()=='true'){
                    var url_short = 'http://www.atletas.info';
                    $.ajax({
                      url: url_short,
                      type:'POST',
                      data:{
                        shortcode: '[header_calendario]',
                        modalidade: ''
                      },
                      success: function(data) {
                        $('.tras_shortcode_eventos').html(data);
                        setTimeout(function(){
                          geo_ip_cal(true); //init_calendario.js
                        },1000);
                      }
                    });
                  }
                });
              });
            </script>

                        <div class="tras_shortcode_eventos short_code_head">
              <input type="hidden" class="nao_tem" value="true" >
                                <img src="http://www.atletas.info/wp-content/themes/ativo/images/loading.gif" style="padding:20px; height: 80px; margin-top: 60px;">
                                  </div>
                              </div>
            </div>
                          <div role="tabpanel" class="tab-pane  " id="tab_su-foto">
      <div class="container block_centers">
                  
            <script>
              jQuery(document).ready(function($){
                $('.ativo_short').click(function(){
                  if($('.tras_shortcode_sua-foto').find('.nao_tem').val()=='true'){
                    var url_short = 'http://www.atletas.info';
                    $.ajax({
                      url: url_short,
                      type:'POST',
                      data:{
                        shortcode: '[encontre_sua_foto]',
                        modalidade: ''
                      },
                      success: function(data) {
                        $('.tras_shortcode_sua-foto').html(data);
                        setTimeout(function(){
                          geo_ip_cal(true); //init_calendario.js
                        },1000);
                      }
                    });
                  }
                });
              });
            </script>

                        <div class="tras_shortcode_sua-foto short_code_head">
              <input type="hidden" class="nao_tem" value="true" >
                                <img src="http://www.atletas.info/wp-content/themes/ativo/images/loading.gif" style="padding:20px; height: 80px; margin-top: 60px;">
                                  </div>
                              </div>
            </div>

  ;(function($){
    var len = $('#rm-ul-menu').find('li').length;
    var width = 100 / len;
    $('#rm-ul-menu').find('li').css('width', width+'%');

      <script>

// Define a posicao inicial do mouse
var mouse_position_switch = false;

// Evento que vai detectar o movimento do mouse
jQuery(document.body).on('mouseleave', function(e) {
    // Evento que dispara quando o mouse for ao topo
    if(mouse_position_switch && retornaCookie('modalcadastrado') == null && retornaCookie('modalexibida') == null ){
      jQuery('#modal-abandono').modal('show');
      // Seta o cookie que a modal foi exibida e assim nao exibira mais // qtd em dias
      setaCookie('modalexibida', '365');
    }
  });

// Funcoes de manipulacao de cookies
function setaCookie(key, value, url) {
  var expires = new Date();
  expires.setTime(expires.getTime() + (value * 1 * 24 * 60 * 60 * 1000));
  document.cookie = key + '=' + value +';path=/'+ ';expires=' + expires.toUTCString();
}

function retornaCookie(key) {
  var keyValue = document.cookie.match('(^|;) ?' + key + '=([^;]*)(;|$)');
  return keyValue ? keyValue[2] : null;
}

// Evento que seta o valor booleano para o mouse e mostra entao a modal do abandono
jQuery(document.body).on('mousemove', function(e) {
  if(e.clientY < 100){
    mouse_position_switch = true;
  } else {
    mouse_position_switch = false;
  }
});

jQuery("#enviar-popup").on('click', function() {
  jQuery("#cadastro-popup").submit()
});

// Eventos do formulario
jQuery('#cadastro-popup').validate({
  rules: {
    nome: { required: true, minlength: 2 },
    email: { required: true, email: true },
  },
  showErrors: function() {
    if (this.settings.highlight) {
      for (var i = 0; this.errorList[i]; ++i) {
        this.settings.highlight.call(this, this.errorList[i].element,
          this.settings.errorClass, this.settings.validClass);
      }
    }
    if (this.settings.unhighlight) {
      for (var i = 0, elements = this.validElements(); elements[i]; ++i) {
        this.settings.unhighlight.call(this, elements[i],
          this.settings.errorClass, this.settings.validClass);
      }
    }
  },                     
  submitHandler: function( form ){

    var cidadecad = 'Argentina';
    var cidadegeo = localStorage.getItem("cidade");
    if(cidadecad==""){
      var cidgrava = cidadegeo;
    }else{
      var cidgrava = cidadecad;
    }
    jQuery.ajax({
      type: "POST",
      url: "http://www.atletas.info/wp-admin/admin-ajax.php?action=salvanewsletter",
      data: {
        idorigem: '42',
        nome: jQuery('#nome-popup').val(),
        email: jQuery('#email-popup').val(),
        cidade: cidgrava,
        etapa: 'Abandono'
      },
      success: function(data, textStatus, xhr) {
        jQuery('#cadastro-popup').fadeOut('fast', function() {
          jQuery('#enviado-popup').fadeIn('fast');
          setaCookie('modalcadastrado', '365'); //define cookie para que o cadastro seja lido posteriormente a fim de nao exibir a modal / 365 dias
        });
      },
      error: function(xhr, textStatus, errorThrown) {
        jQuery('#cadastro-popup').fadeOut('fast', function() {
          jQuery('#falha-popup').fadeIn('fast');
        });
      }
    });
    return false;
  }
});




</script>
		<script>
			if (typeof gform !== 'undefined') {
				gform.addFilter('gform_file_upload_markup', function (html, file) {

					html = html.split("<strong>").reverse();

					html[1] = html[1].replace(/src='.*?'/, "src='http://www.atletas.info/wp-content/plugins/ativo-reporter/images/delete-file.png'");

					html = '<span class="filename"><strong>' + html[0] + '</span><span class="size">' + plupload.formatSize(file.size) + '</span>' + html[1];

					return html;
				});
			}
		</script>

Na legenda, ela explicou, deu um código de desconto e pediu para ninguém reparar na bagunça do quarto.— Gente...dá pra usar embaixo de qualquer roupa. Com o código SABRINA10 tem desconto especial. #ÉVerdade #BioBela #SabrinaSato #Cinta PS; não reparem na bagunça do meu quarto, todos os dias faço isso pra provar roupa...&amp;nbsp;Mas muita gente tem dúvidas sobre a eficácia e os perigos do uso desse tipo de produto. </h6>

<a href="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=olyLqpPTEms" target="" class="headline droppable" data-origin="title" title="Marcos Mion analisa dancinhas e cantadas do Justin Bieber &quot;raiz&quot;">

</a>
</p>

		$( "#formCity" ).autocomplete({
			source: availableTags,
			minLength: 1,
		    select: function( event, ui ) {
		      $("#formCityId").val(ui.item.city_id);
		      $("#formStateId").val(ui.item.state_id);
		      $("#formState").val(ui.item.state);
		    },
		    open: function() {
		      $( this ).removeClass( "ui-corner-all" ).addClass( "ui-corner-top" );
		    },
		    close: function() {
		      $( this ).removeClass( "ui-corner-top" ).addClass( "ui-corner-all" );
		    }
		});
	});
	</script>

                          <div role="tabpanel" class="tab-pane  " id="tab_sua-foto">
      <div class="container block_centers">
                  
            <script>
              jQuery(document).ready(function($){
                $('.ativo_short').click(function(){
                  if($('.tras_shortcode_sua-foto').find('.nao_tem').val()=='true'){
                    var url_short = 'https://www.ativo.com';
                    $.ajax({
                      url: url_short,
                      type:'POST',
                      data:{
                        shortcode: '[encontre_sua_foto]',
                        modalidade: ''
                      },
                      success: function(data) {
                        $('.tras_shortcode_sua-foto').html(data);
                        setTimeout(function(){
                          geo_ip_cal(true); //init_calendario.js
                        },1000);
                      }
                    });
                  }
                });
              });
            </script>

                        <div class="tras_shortcode_sua-foto short_code_head">

   <div class="row" style="padding:0 15px;">
      <div class="col-sm-12 col-md-12 pamobi">
         <div class="content_head_filter_calendar_sidebar ">
            <div class="row content_sidebar_filter_calendar">
               <section class="regular slider content_calendar" style="display: block;">

               </section>
            </div>
            <div class="loading_short_calendario" style="margin-top: 45px;"></div>
         </div>
      </div>
      <div class="col-sm-12 col-md-12 no-padding">
         <div style="text-align:right;">
            <a style="width:100%;" href="" class="btn btn-default btn_todos_eventos todos_side">Todos os eventos</a>

</div></div></div>                </div>

        <script type='text/javascript'>
          var makeShortcut = function(keyNumber, locationHref, fn) {
            var shortcuts = [
                'alt+' + keyNumber,
                'shift+alt+' + keyNumber,
                'command+' + keyNumber,
                'ctrl+' + keyNumber
            ],
            _fn = fn || function() {
                window.location = locationHref;
            };
            Mousetrap.bind(shortcuts, function() {
                _fn();
                return false;
            });
          };
          // página inicial
          makeShortcut(1, 'http://r7.com');
          // ir para conteúdo
          makeShortcut(2, '#', function() {
              scroll(0,0);
          });
          // mapa do site
          makeShortcut(3, 'http://www.r7.com/institucional/mapa-do-site/index.html');
          // foco no campo de busca
          makeShortcut(4, 'http://busca.r7.com');
          // informações de contato (página Fale com o R7)
          makeShortcut(9, 'http://noticias.r7.com/murais/fale-com-o-r7-29062016');
          // detalhes das teclas de atalho (página Acessibilidade)
          makeShortcut(0, 'http://noticias.r7.com/acessibilidade/conheca-as-ferramentas-de-acessibilidade-disponiveis-no-r7com-19082016');

							<span class="sdt_link">Contact</span>
							<span class="sdt_descr">Contact Us</span>
						</span>
					</a>
				
				</li>
			</ul>
		</div>
        <div>
            <span class="reference">
                <a href="http://twitter.com/worldrecordtv/" target="_blank"><img src="img/twitter.png" alt="" width="30" height="30" /></a>
				<a href="http://www.youtube.com/recordtvnetwork/" target="_blank"><img src="img/youtube.png" alt="" width="30" height="30" /></a>
                	<a href="http://www.facebook.com/pages/Record-TV-Network/121711461237396" target="_blank"><img src="img/face.png" alt="" width="30" height="30" /></a>
            </span>
</div>

        <!-- The JavaScript -->
        <script type="text/javascript" src="http://ajax.googleapis.com/ajax/libs/jquery/1.4.2/jquery.min.js"></script>
		<script type="text/javascript" src="menu/jquery.easing.1.3.js"></script>
        <script type="text/javascript">
            $(function() {
				/**
				* for each menu element, on mouseenter, 
				* we enlarge the image, and show both sdt_active span and 
				* sdt_wrap span. If the element has a sub menu (sdt_box),
				* then we slide it - if the element is the last one in the menu
				* we slide it to the left, otherwise to the right
				*/
                $('#sdt_menu > li').bind('mouseenter',function(){
					var $elem = $(this);
					$elem.find('img')
						 .stop(true)
						 .animate({
							'width':'170px',
							'height':'170px',
							'left':'0px'
						 },400,'easeOutBack')
						 .andSelf()
						 .find('.sdt_wrap')
					     .stop(true)
						 .animate({'top':'140px'},500,'easeOutBack')
						 .andSelf()
						 .find('.sdt_active')
					     .stop(true)
						 .animate({'height':'170px'},300,function(){
						var $sub_menu = $elem.find('.sdt_box');
						if($sub_menu.length){
							var left = '170px';
							if($elem.parent().children().length == $elem.index()+1)
								left = '-170px';
							$sub_menu.show().animate({'left':left},200);
						}	
					});
				}).bind('mouseleave',function(){
					var $elem = $(this);
					var $sub_menu = $elem.find('.sdt_box');
					if($sub_menu.length)
						$sub_menu.hide().css('left','0px');
					
					$elem.find('.sdt_active')
						 .stop(true)
						 .animate({'height':'0px'},300)
						 .andSelf().find('img')
						 .stop(true)
						 .animate({
							'width':'0px',
							'height':'0px',
							'left':'85px'},400)
						 .andSelf()
						 .find('.sdt_wrap')
						 .stop(true)
						 .animate({'top':'25px'},500);
				});
            });
        </script>
    </body>
</html></div>

    <script type="text/javascript" language="JavaScript">    
       function AbreJanela(url, width, height) {
            var largura = width;
            var altura = height;
            var winX = screen.width;
            var winY = screen.height;
            var x = (winX - largura) / 2;
            var y = ((winY - altura) / 2) - 5;
            var posicao = "width=" + largura + ",height=" + altura + ",outerWidth=" + largura + ",outerHeight=" + altura + ",top=" + y + "," + "left=" + x;
            window.open(url, "Simulador", "resizable=no,toolbar=no,status=no,menubar=no,scrollbars=no," + posicao);
        }
    </script>

toogle(a,b){if(document.getElementById("iG_social").parentElement.setAttribute("class",""),null!=a&&null!=b){var c=document.getElementById(a),d=c.getAttribute("class");null==d?c.setAttribute("class",b):d.replace(/[\n\t]/g," ").indexOf(b)==-1?c.setAttribute("class",c.getAttribute("class")+" 		<script type="text/javascript">
			//---------------------------------------------------------

			function onPopupDialog(strDialogURL, strWidth, strHeight, strCustomData)
			{
				var strOpenURL = strDialogURL+"&CustomData="+strCustomData;

				if(strOpenURL.search("ServiceInstUID")==-1)
					strOpenURL += "&ServiceInstUID={D2ADD0F5-7870-444F-9544-C1A0D6A52E57}";

				
				strOpenURL += "&ItemID={523C0CCD-3E65-47DD-A811-23D3C0B3D9CF}";
				

				var intTop = (screen.height-strHeight)/2;
				var intLeft = (screen.width-strWidth)/2;
				if (intTop > 16)
					intTop -=16;
				window.open(strOpenURL, "_blank", "TOP="+intTop+",SCREENY="+intTop+",HEIGHT="+strHeight+",LEFT="+intLeft+",SCREENX="+intLeft+",WIDTH="+strWidth+",resizable,scrollbars");
			}


			//---------------------------------------------------------

			function onWorkFlowActionChanged()
			{
				if(document.getElementById("_EZTAssignedToUser_"))
					document.getElementById("_EZTAssignedToUser_").value="";

				if(document.getElementById("_EZTAssignedToUser_Display"))
					document.getElementById("_EZTAssignedToUser_Display").innerText = "";

				return true;
			}

			//---------------------------------------------------------

			function LumisOnTextCountChanged(pObjSource, strDestID)
			{
				var iSize = pObjSource.value.length;

				if(document.getElementById(strDestID))
					document.getElementById(strDestID).innerText=iSize;

				return true;
			}

		<script type="text/javascript">
			function onBodyLoad()
			{
				if(g_allowAdminDisplayMode)
					document.onkeydown = onKeyDown;

				for(var i=0; i< g_arrInitFunctions.length; i++)
					g_arrInitFunctions[i]();

				g_EZTWindowLoaded = true;

				
			}

			//-------------------------------------------------------------------

			function onKeyDown()
			{
				if(window.event.keyCode == 123 && g_allowAdminDisplayMode)
				{
					if(g_displayMode == 0)
					{
						if(window.event.ctrlKey)
							g_displayMode = 2;
						else
							g_displayMode = 1;
					}
					else
						g_displayMode = 0;

					EZTService.gotoChannel(g_strTeamID, g_strViewID, g_strSubViewID);
				}
			}

			var strClientMessage = document.getElementsByName("_EZTClientMessage_")[0].value;
			if (strClientMessage != "")
			{
				alert(strClientMessage);
				document.getElementsByName("_EZTClientMessage_")[0].value = "";
			}
		</script><div style="display:none"><img alt="Imagem para contabilização de acessos a páginas" src="../../LumisLog.asp?T=%7B2D3BEDD6%2D15CC%2D41C4%2DB423%2DC08F562C4F3D%7D&amp;V=%7B293E16C4%2DA8C9%2D49C8%2DAF77%2DDD1B488978EC%7D&amp;L=pt%2Dbr&amp;P=0&amp;M=0&amp;VN=Portal+da+Eletrobras&amp;TN=Eletrobras"/></div>

function Disab (val) {

switch (val) {
case "forecasts":
document.form1.ano.disabled = false;
document.getElementById('tipo').style.visibility = 'visible';
document.getElementById('tipo2').style.visibility = 'hidden';
document.getElementById('fore').style.visibility = 'visible';
document.getElementById('veri').style.visibility = 'hidden';
break;
case "verification":
document.form1.ano.disabled = true;
document.getElementById('tipo').style.visibility = 'hidden';
document.getElementById('tipo2').style.visibility = 'visible';
document.getElementById('veri').style.visibility = 'visible';
document.getElementById('fore').style.visibility = 'hidden';
break;
}
}

function nome(imageName) {

var vari = document.getElementById('form1').variavel.value;
var model = document.getElementById('form1').model.value;
var param = document.getElementById('form1').param.value;
var mes = document.getElementById('form1').mes.value;
var ano = document.getElementById('form1').ano.value;

var m=new Array("00","01","02","03","04","05","06","07","08","09","10","11","12")
var m_ant=new Array("00","12","01","02","03","04","05","06","07","08","09","10","11")
var trim=new Array("XX","FMA","MAM","AMJ","MJJ","JJA","JAS","ASO","SON","OND","NDJ","DJF","JFM")

if(vari=="forecasts")
{
var tipo = document.getElementById('form1').tipo.value;
var imageName1="http://img0.cptec.inpe.br/~reuroimg/"+vari+"/"+model+"/"+param+"/"+m[mes]+"/"+ano+"/"+model+"-forecast-"+tipo+param+"-"+trim[mes]+"-"+ano+".png";
document.getElementById("mapa").src=imageName1;

}

if(vari=="verification")
{
var tipo2 = document.getElementById('form1').tipo2.value;
var imageName2="http://img0.cptec.inpe.br/~reuroimg/"+vari+"/"+model+"/"+param+"/"+m[mes]+"/"+model+"-"+tipo2+"sst-"+m_ant[mes]+"-"+param+"-"+trim[mes]+".png";
document.getElementById("mapa").src=imageName2;
}

}


//]]>

return textos;
}

<div class="cont_dir">
<!--conteudo lateral-->
<div class="informativo">
Key idea: To improve seasonal forecasts in South America, a region where there is seasonal forecast skill and useful value
</div>
<br />
<div class="modulo">
<ul>
<li><span class="seta"></span><a href="/">HOME</a></li>
</ul>

</div>

 <div class="sub">Aims </div>
  <div class="modulo">
<ul>
 <li><span class="seta"></span>Strengthen collaboration and promote exchange of expertise and information between European and South American seasonal forecasters<br /><br /></li>
  <li><span class="seta"></span>Produce improved well-calibrated real-time probabilistic seasonal forecasts for South America<br /><br /></li>
<li><span class="seta"></span>Develop real-time forecast products for non-profitable governmental use (e.g. reservoir management, hydropower production, and agriculture).</li>
</ul>
 </div>
  <div class="sub">Project information </div>
  <div class="modulo">
<ul>
 <li><span class="seta"></span><a href="/history/in">History</a></li>
  <li><span class="seta"></span><a href="/partners/in">Partners</a></li>
</ul>
 </div>
 <div class="sub">Documents</div>
 <div class="modulo">
<ul>
 <li><span class="seta"></span> <a href="/~reurob/pdf/project-eurobrisa-v5.pdf">EUROBRISA project proposal</a><br>
 <i>approved by ECMWF council in June 2005: </li>
see page 5 of <a href="/~reurob/pdf/ECMWFnewsletter104.pdf">ECMWF newsletter No. 104</a></i></li>
 <li><span class="seta"></span> <a href="/~reurob/pdf/Leverhulme-network.pdf">Leverhulme research network proposal</a></li>
 <li><span class="seta"></span> <a href="/~reurob/ppt/EUROBRISA.ppt">Powerpoint overview</a></li>
</ul>
 </div>
 <div class="sub">Presentations</div>
 <div class="modulo">
<ul>
 <li><span class="seta"></span> <a href="/~reurob/ppt/Brasil_maio_2005_v1.ppt">EUROBRISA Integrated System Talk <br>
<i>in Portuguese - given at CPTEC and INMET, May 2005</i></a></li>
 <li><span class="seta"></span> <a href="http://www.cptec.inpe.br/cgi-bin/webpub/noticia.cgi?3182">Summary and Video <br>
<i>talk given at CPTEC</i></a></li>
 <li><span class="seta"></span> <a href="/~reurob/ppt/EUROBRISA-CPTEC-IRI-workshop.ppt">EUROBRISA talk<br>
<i>given at CPTEC-INMET-IRI workshop, November 2006</i></a></li>
 <li><span class="seta"></span> <a href="/~reurob/pdf/poster-caio.pdf">EUROBRISA poster<br>
<i>presented at WCRP workshop on seasonal prediction,
Barcelona, 4-7 June 2007</i></a></li>
</ul>
 </div>

  <div class="sub">PUBLICATIONS</div>
  <div class="modulo">
<ul>
 <li><span class="seta"></span> <a href="/publications/in"> EUROBRISA articles</li>
</ul>
</div>

	  google.load('search', '1', {language : 'pt-BR'});
	  $(".bt-search").click(function(){
	  	termoBuscador = $(".field-search").val();
	  	
		  	window.location = "/pt/busca/?q=" + termoBuscador;
		
	  });
	  
	  $(".field-search").keypress(function(e){
	  	termoBuscadorEnter = $(".field-search").val();
	  
	    if(e.which == 13) {
			
			 	window.location = "/pt/busca/?q=" + termoBuscadorEnter;
			
		}
	  });

	  // caixa de resultados
	  google.setOnLoadCallback(function() {
	    
			var customSearchControl = new google.search.CustomSearchControl('010944926229659107503:bambk6mosym');
		
	    customSearchControl.setResultSetSize(google.search.Search.FILTERED_CSE_RESULTSET);
		customSearchControl.setLinkTarget(google.search.Search.LINK_TARGET_PARENT);
		
		customSearchControl.setSearchStartingCallback(this,function(control, searcher) {searcher.setRestriction(google.search.Search.RESTRICT_EXTENDED_ARGS,{"filter":"0"});});
		
	    customSearchControl.draw('cse');
	    function parseParamsFromUrl() {
	      var params = {};
	      var parts = window.location.search.substr(1).split('\x26');
	      for (var i = 0; i < parts.length; i++) {
	        var keyValuePair = parts[i].split('=');
	        var key = decodeURIComponent(keyValuePair[0]);
	        params[key] = keyValuePair[1] ?
	            decodeURIComponent(keyValuePair[1].replace(/\+/g, ' ')) :
	            keyValuePair[1];
	      }
	      return params;
	    }
	    var urlParams = parseParamsFromUrl();
	    var queryParamName = "q";
	    if (urlParams[queryParamName]) {
	      customSearchControl.execute(urlParams[queryParamName]);
	    }
	    $("#gsc-i-id1").addClass("field");
	    $("#gsc-i-id1").addClass("search-page");
 		$("#cse input.gsc-search-button").addClass("bt-search-page");
 		termoTopo = $("#gsc-i-id1").val();
 		$('#termoBuscaPagina').text('"' + termoTopo + '"');
 		$("#cse input.gsc-search-button").click(function(){
 			termo = $("#gsc-i-id1").val();
 			$('#termoBuscaPagina').text('"' + termo + '"');
 		}); 
 		$("#gsc-i-id1").keypress(function(e){
		  	termoBuscadorEnt = $("#gsc-i-id1").val();
		    if(e.which == 13) {
				$('#termoBuscaPagina').text('"' + termoBuscadorEnt + '"');
			}
	  	});
	  }, true);

          <strong class="section-title">Reach potential customers</strong>
          <p>Get your messages in front of people not yet following you by promoting your Tweets
        </div>

    <div class="advertising-steps section">
      <div class="container">
        <h3 class="how-it-works text-center">How it works</h3>

        <div class="advertising-steps-box targeting">
          <strong>Choose your target audience</strong>
          <p>Reach the right audience by targeting based on interests, geography, gender, device, or users similar to your followers. In addition, maximize the relevancy of your message by targeting by keywords in people’s Tweets.
          <div class="targeting-image"></div>
        </div>

        <div class="advertising-steps-box amplify">
          <strong>Amplify your message and get discovered</strong>
          <p>Get your Tweets and your account in front of more people who are interested in you.
          <div class="targeting-image"></div>
        </div>

        <div class="advertising-steps-box budget last">
          <strong>Set a budget and pay for what works</strong>
          <p>Only pay when users follow your account or retweet, like, reply, or click on your Promoted Tweet. You’re in complete control. There’s no minimum spend, and you can start and stop at any time.</p>
          <div class="targeting-image"></div>
        </div>

    <script nonce="7zc9ib7b+1caAe4fyhPZHA==" id="track-ttft-body-script">
  if(window.ttft){
    window.ttft.recordMilestone('page', document.getElementById('swift-page-name').getAttribute('content'));
    window.ttft.recordMilestone('section', document.getElementById('swift-section-name').getAttribute('content'));
    window.ttft.recordMilestone('client_record_time', window.ttft.now());
  }
</script>

							<div class="alert alert-success">
										<a class="close" data-dismiss="alert">×</a>

											<h4 class="alert-heading">Message</h4>
						<div>
															<p class="alert-message"><h3>The Joomla! Shop is offline for a bit while we re-tool everything before our next Joomla! release (3.7)</h3></p>
													</div>
									</div>

	<div class="body">

								<main id="content" class="span9">
					<!-- Begin Content -->
					
					<div id="system-message-container">
	</div>

					<div class="blog-featured" itemscope itemtype="https://schema.org/Blog">
<div class="page-header">
	<h1>
	Latest Blogs	</h1>
</div>

<div class="items-leading clearfix">
			<div class="leading-0 clearfix" 
			itemprop="blogPost" itemscope itemtype="https://schema.org/BlogPosting">
			

	<h2 class="item-title-lead" itemprop="name">
			<a href="/blogs/leadership/3108-meet-the-new-open-source-matters-board-of-directors.html" itemprop="url">
			Meet the new Open Source Matters (OSM) Board of Directors		</a>
		</h2>




		<div class="item-image"><a href="/blogs/leadership/3108-meet-the-new-open-source-matters-board-of-directors.html" itemprop="url"> <img src="/images/blogs/leadership-blog/joomla_leadership_structure-crop.png" alt=""/> </a></div>


<p class="lead">After many, many months, the OSM Board of Directors under the new structure is finally complete.&nbsp;The official role of the newly elected Board Members are effective immediately.</p>



	
<p class="readmore">
	<a class="btn" href="/blogs/leadership/3108-meet-the-new-open-source-matters-board-of-directors.html" itemprop="url">
		<span class="icon-chevron-right"></span>
		Read more ...	</a>
</p>



	


		</div>
			</div>
	
		
		<div class="items-row cols-2 row-0 row-fluid">
					<div class="item column-1 span6"
				itemprop="blogPost" itemscope itemtype="https://schema.org/BlogPosting">
			

	<h3 class="item-title" itemprop="name">
			<a href="/blogs/leadership/3107-joomla-department-coordinator-revote-nominee-announcement.html" itemprop="url">
			Joomla! Department Coordinator Revote Nominee Announcement		</a>
		</h3>







<p class="lead">The following individuals have confirmed their acceptance of their nomination for the role of Department Coordinator. Included are comments provided by the nominator(s) of each, nominees are listed in no particular order.</p>



	
<p class="readmore">
	<a class="btn" href="/blogs/leadership/3107-joomla-department-coordinator-revote-nominee-announcement.html" itemprop="url">
		<span class="icon-chevron-right"></span>
		Read more ...	</a>
</p>



			</div>
			
			
	
					<div class="item column-2 span6"
				itemprop="blogPost" itemscope itemtype="https://schema.org/BlogPosting">
			

	<h3 class="item-title" itemprop="name">
			<a href="/blogs/community/3106-applications-for-the-jet-programme-for-j-and-beyond-2017-are-now-open.html" itemprop="url">
			Applications for the JET programme for J and Beyond 2017 are now CLOSED		</a>
		</h3>







<p class="lead">The Joomla! Event Traveller Programme (JET) is pleased to announce that we will be taking applications from the worldwide Joomla community for the upcoming JandBeyond, to be held between 2nd-4th June 2017 Kraków Poland.</p>



	
<p class="readmore">
	<a class="btn" href="/blogs/community/3106-applications-for-the-jet-programme-for-j-and-beyond-2017-are-now-open.html" itemprop="url">
		<span class="icon-chevron-right"></span>
		Read more ...	</a>
</p>



			</div>
			
			
		</div>

		</div>
			<div class="moduletable visible-desktop ad-respond">

	<!-- Body -->
	<div class="body">
		<div class="container">
					<div class="moduletable">
						
<div class="row-fluid banner-position ">
	<div class="span9">
<div id="jFeatures" class="carousel slide">
<ol class="nav nav-tabs nav-stacked ">
	
		
		<ol class="carousel-indicators">
       
							
				<li data-slide-to="0" data-target="#jFeatures"  class="active"></li>
				
							
				<li data-slide-to="1" data-target="#jFeatures" ></li>
				
							
				<li data-slide-to="2" data-target="#jFeatures" ></li>
				
							
				<li data-slide-to="3" data-target="#jFeatures" ></li>
				
							
				<li data-slide-to="4" data-target="#jFeatures" ></li>
				
							
				<li data-slide-to="5" data-target="#jFeatures" ></li>
				
						
		</ol>
		
		<div class="carousel-inner">
							<div class="item active clearfix">
					<div class="span6 center">
						<a href="/3/159-create-categories-on-the-fly">
							<img class="img-responsive" title="" alt="TOP Joomla! 3.6 feature icon" src="/3/images/features/en/j_3_6_create-categories-435x360_intro.png" />						</a>
					</div>
					
					<div class="span6">
						
						<p class="title">Create categories on the fly </p>
						<div class="visible-desktop">
                          <p>It can get frustrating when you create a new item, and you realise that you haven’t created a category yet. Joomla! 3.6 now lets you create a category on the fly for articles, contacts, newsfeeds and banners.</p>                      </div>
					</div>
					
						<a class="carousel-control left" href="#jFeatures" data-slide="prev">&lsaquo;</a>
						<a class="carousel-control right" href="#jFeatures" data-slide="next">&rsaquo;</a>
				</div>
				
							<div class="item clearfix">
					<div class="span6 center">
						<a href="/3/180-improved-joomla-updates">
							<img class="img-responsive" title="" alt="TOP Joomla! 3.6 Feature" src="/3/images/features/en/j_3_6_joomla-updates-435x360_intro.png" />						</a>
					</div>
					
					<div class="span6">
						
						<p class="title">Improved Joomla! Updates </p>
						<div class="visible-desktop">
                          <p>This update adds an option for reinstalling Joomla&rsquo;s core files at the click of a button, overwriting any modified file(s) and reverting them back to the default. The option to update Joomla! by uploading the update file has been restored, as it was requested by feedback that the Joomla! Production Leadership Team (PLT) received from the Joomla! community.</p>
                      </div>
					</div>
					
						<a class="carousel-control left" href="#jFeatures" data-slide="prev">&lsaquo;</a>
						<a class="carousel-control right" href="#jFeatures" data-slide="next">&rsaquo;</a>
				</div>
				
							<div class="item clearfix">
					<div class="span6 center">
						<a href="/3/158-menu-type-acl">
							<img class="img-responsive" title="" alt="TOP Joomla! 3.6 feature icon" src="/3/images/features/en/j_3_6_menu-acl-435x360_intro.png" />						</a>
					</div>
					
					<div class="span6">
						
						<p class="title">Menu type ACL </p>
						<div class="visible-desktop">
                          <p>ACL in the backend did not exist at the menu level, now we have improved that. Give or block certain user groups access to a specific menu, and therefore also all menu items of that menu.</p>
                      </div>
					</div>
					
						<a class="carousel-control left" href="#jFeatures" data-slide="prev">&lsaquo;</a>
						<a class="carousel-control right" href="#jFeatures" data-slide="next">&rsaquo;</a>
				</div>
				
							<div class="item clearfix">
					<div class="span6 center">
						<a href="/3/157-see-what-s-in-your-menus-with-all-menu-items">
							<img class="img-responsive" title="" alt="TOP Joomla! 3.6 feature icon" src="/3/images/features/en/j_3_6_all-menu-435x360_intro.png" />						</a>
					</div>
					
					<div class="span6">
						
						<p class="title">See what's in your menus with All Menu Items </p>
						<div class="visible-desktop">
                          <p>The new option to show all items from all menus gives you a quick overview of what is displayed where on your website. It has never been easier to spot duplicated links, missing menu items or just get an overview of every menu on your site.</p>
                      </div>
					</div>
					
						<a class="carousel-control left" href="#jFeatures" data-slide="prev">&lsaquo;</a>
						<a class="carousel-control right" href="#jFeatures" data-slide="next">&rsaquo;</a>
				</div>
				
							<div class="item clearfix">
					<div class="span6 center">
						<a href="/3/160-sub-form-field">
							<img class="img-responsive" title="" alt="TOP Joomla! 3.6 feature icon" src="/3/images/features/en/j_3_6_subform-field-435x360_intro.png" />						</a>
					</div>
					
					<div class="span6">
						
						<p class="title">Sub Form Field </p>
						<div class="visible-desktop">
                          <p>With the new Sub Form Field function in Joomla! 3.6 we added some extra additional functionality next to Repeatable fields. Now you can nest XML forms inside each other or reuse your existing forms inside your current form.</p>
                      </div>
					</div>
					
						<a class="carousel-control left" href="#jFeatures" data-slide="prev">&lsaquo;</a>
						<a class="carousel-control right" href="#jFeatures" data-slide="next">&rsaquo;</a>
				</div>
				
							<div class="item clearfix">
					<div class="span6 center">
						<a href="/3/161-the-revolution-in-joomla-ux-improvements">
							<img class="img-responsive" title="" alt="TOP Joomla! 3.6 feature icon" src="/3/images/features/en/j_3_6_ux_improvements-435x360_intro.png" />						</a>
					</div>
					
					<div class="span6">
						
						<p class="title">The revolution in Joomla! UX Improvements </p>
						<div class="visible-desktop">
                          <p>Joomla! 3.6 contains a lot of UX improvements. Now you can find your modules faster, have tasks done by dropdown, improved user management and so much more. Check all of the UX improvements in the full article.</p>
                      </div>
					</div>
					
						<a class="carousel-control left" href="#jFeatures" data-slide="prev">&lsaquo;</a>
						<a class="carousel-control right" href="#jFeatures" data-slide="next">&rsaquo;</a>
				</div>
				
					</div>
	</ol>
  </div>
</div>
	<div class="span3 ">		<div class="moduletable center">
						

<div class="custom center"  >
	<p><img src="/3/images/banners/36/j_3_6_right_banner.png" alt="Joomla 3.6" width="268" height="208" /></p>
<h3 class="visible-desktop">Do more with Joomla! 3.6</h3>
<p><a href="https://downloads.joomla.org/" target="_blank" class="btn btn-success btn-large" title="Download Joomla! 3.6">Download Now</a></p></div>

						</svg>

				</a>
			</li>

</div>
<p>This update adds an option for reinstalling Joomla&rsquo;s core files at the click of a button, overwriting any modified file(s) and reverting them back to the default. The option to update Joomla! by uploading the update file has been restored, as it was requested by feedback that the Joomla! Production Leadership Team (PLT) received from the Joomla! community.</p>



      </div>
      <div class="clr">      </div>

<p>Joomla! 3.6 contains a lot of UX improvements. Now you can find your modules faster, have tasks done by dropdown, improved user management and so much more. Check all of the UX improvements in the full article.</p>

<p>With the new Sub Form Field function in Joomla! 3.6 we added some extra additional functionality next to Repeatable fields. Now you can nest XML forms inside each other or reuse your existing forms inside your current form.</p>

<p>It can get frustrating when you create a new item, and you realise that you haven’t created a category yet. Joomla! 3.6 now lets you create a category on the fly for articles, contacts, newsfeeds and banners.</p>

<p>ACL in the backend did not exist at the menu level, now we have improved that. Give or block certain user groups access to a specific menu, and therefore also all menu items of that menu.</p>

						</svg>

					<span class="rrssb-text">pinterest</span>
				</a>

			</ul>
</div>
<p>The new option to show all items from all menus gives you a quick overview of what is displayed where on your website. It has never been easier to spot duplicated links, missing menu items or just get an overview of every menu on your site.</p>



      </div>
      <div class="clr">      </div>

<script type="text/javascript">
	jQuery(document).ready(function ($) {
		// Update order direction
		$('select[name=order]').on('change', function () {
			if ($(this).val() === 'core_title') {
				$('input[name=dir]').val('ASC');
			} else {
				$('input[name=dir]').val('DESC');
			}
		});
	});
</script>

								<div itemprop="articleBody">
		<div class="container text-center">
<h1 class="animated fadeInDown">Welcome to Open Source Matters!</h1>
<h2 class="animated fadeInDown">The non-profit organisation supporting the Joomla! project.</h2>
</div>
<div class="iconed-features lift-on-hover style-1">
<div class="row">
<div class="col-md-4">
<div class="iconed-feature">
<div class="feature-icon-w"><em class="icon-info-sign"></em></div>
<h4>About</h4>
<p>How Open Source Matters supports the Joomla! project.</p>
<div class="btn-show-on-parent-hover"><a href="/organisation.html"><span class="read-more-link">LEARN MORE</span></a></div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="col-md-4">
<div class="iconed-feature">
<div class="feature-icon-w"><em class="icon-heart-empty"></em></div>
<h4>Support</h4>
<p>Discover the many ways you can support the Joomla! Project.</p>
<div class="btn-show-on-parent-hover"><a href="https://www.joomla.org/sponsorship" target="_blank"><span class="read-more-link">FIND OUT HOW</span></a></div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="col-md-4">
<div class="iconed-feature">
<div class="feature-icon-w"><em class="icon-user"></em></div>
<h4>Volunteers</h4>
<p>The Joomla! project is 100% &nbsp;run by dedicated, passionate volunteers.</p>
<div class="btn-show-on-parent-hover"><a href="https://volunteers.joomla.org/" target="_blank"><span class="read-more-link">MEET THEM</span></a></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="col-md-4">
<h2 class="header-lined nomarg-top">Joomla!</h2>
<ul class="list-checkmarked text-bigger">
<li>Joomla! currently powers 3.3% of the entire internet and 7.1% of content managed websites. Websites ranging from small blogs to large Fortune 500 companies worldwide use Joomla!.</li>
<li>Recently Joomla! passed the 80 million download mark. In the world of open source content management systems Joomla! stands out from the rest. <br /><br /> <a href="https://www.joomla.org/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer" class="btn btn-primary btn-cta btn-lg">Visit www.joomla.org</a></li>
</ul>
</div>
<div class="col-md-8">
<p><a href="https://downloads.joomla.org/"><img src="/images/80-milion-thank-you.jpg" alt="80 milion thank you" /></a></p>
</div> 	</div>

    </div>

	<header class="entry-header">
		<h1 class="entry-title">Madden Mobile Hack</h1>	</header><!-- .entry-header -->

	
	<div class="entry-content">
		<p><img class="alignright wp-image-37 size-thumbnail" src="http://maddenmobile.cheatspro.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/01/09-150x150.png" width="150" height="150" srcset="http://maddenmobile.cheatspro.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/01/09-150x150.png 150w, http://maddenmobile.cheatspro.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/01/09.png 300w" sizes="(max-width: 150px) 85vw, 150px" />This is an amazing game concept created by EA Mobile as a <a rel="nofollow" href="https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.ea.game.maddenmobile15_row">publisher</a> and developer of this game. This is vastly popular and played in the US. It gives out the energy and vibe as being played in the field. This game is played by millions of around the world, making it very competitive so the reasons to use <strong>madden mobile hack</strong> are obvious. This is a game of reward systems that if you win you win madden cash or madden coins.</p>
<p>Unfortunately it’s not so easy to get these coins to play …until now. We make available to you a set of unlimited amounts of Madden coins and Madden cash at your fingertips with our madden mobile cheats. Your pockets will be bursting at the seams.</p>
<p style="text-align: center;"><a rel="nofollow" href="http://maddenmobilegen.com/" class="large otw-red round right-icon otw-button"><i class="general foundicon-tools"></i>Go To Madden Mobile Hack</a></p>
<p>It’s a great way to play for complete collection of free coins. Get in this amazing experience.</p>
<p>With the help of this tool, you get your selection of Madden coins absolutely free, no downloads, no app store subscription, sign up and get going. All you have to do is continue to the next page to use our generator. Its super simple, within 20 minutes the coins will be added to your account.</p>
<h3>How to use our Madden Mobile Hack tool</h3>
<p><center><br />
<iframe src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/z0-olYWoDrk" width="640" height="360" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="allowfullscreen"></iframe><center></center></center></p>
<p style="text-align: center;"><strong>In the video above there is a step by step walkthrough of how to use the madden mobile hack.</strong></p>
<p>The game is cool that there are million subscriptions and players. The beauty of it is that this football game contains players of the past and the present so that the teams can be chosen as you wish.</p>
<p>With Madden Mobile Hack you could be assured that you get to <a href="http://maddenmobile.cheatspro.com/lets-play-with-maddennflmobile-cheatspro-com/">play with all the skill and strategy</a> with the madden coins and get the next level of madden mobile cheats.</p>
<p>Now this game awaits your participation so join in and get a chance of collecting madden coins, madden cash and play under the names of the top players all with the help of our hack.</p>
<p>Check out our <a href="http://maddenmobile.cheatspro.com/faq/">FAQ</a> if you have any questions about our service, or use our <a href="http://maddenmobile.cheatspro.com/contact-us/">contact form</a> to get ahold of the team!</p>

function MM_openBrWindow(theURL,winName,features) { //v2.0
  var contextRoot = "http://e-poupatempo.cdhu.sp.gov.br/epoupatempocdhu";
  window.open(contextRoot + theURL,winName,features);

//Abrir janela no centro

function openWindow(contentURL,windowName,windowWidth,windowHeight) {
    var contextRoot = "http://e-poupatempo.cdhu.sp.gov.br/epoupatempocdhu";
    var largura = windowWidth;
    var altura = windowHeight;
    var topo = (screen.height-altura)/2;
    var esquerda = (screen.width-largura)/2;
    newWindow = window.open(''+ contextRoot +''+ contentURL +'',''+ windowName + '','status=yes, width=' + largura + ',height=' + altura + ',top=' + topo + ',left=' + esquerda + '');
    newWindow.focus();
}

//Fim abrir janela

function abrirPopup() {
    openWindow('/CDHU/identificacaoMutuario/','','790','510');
}

//-->

			<li><a href="/programas_habitacionais/urbanizacao_de_favelas_e_assentamentos_precarios/apresentacao.asp">Urbanização de Favelas e Assentamentos Precários</a></li>

			<li><a href="/programas_habitacionais/habitacao_sustentavel/apresentacao.asp">Habitação Sustentável e Recuperação Ambiental na Serra do Mar e Litoral Paulista</a></li>

        </li>
		
       
	   </ul>
    </div>

		<br class="clear" />	<br class="clear" />
	<div class="fl_center">
	
      <h2><a href="/atendimento/postos-cdhu.asp">CDHU para dispositivos móveis &raquo;</a></h2>

		<p>O aplicativo permite que o mutuário gere a 2&ordf; via de boleto da última prestação ou de prestações em atraso em seu telefone celular ou tablet. E tamb&eacute;m  possibilita enviar o boleto por e-mail ou gerar a linha digitável para pagamento no caixa eletrônico ou nas casas lotéricas.</p> 
		<div class="fl_left">
		<p><a href ="https://itunes.apple.com/br/app/cdhu/id952686533?mt=8" target="_blank"><img src="/img/img-botao-appstore.jpg" border="0" /></a>Para dispositivos Apple</p></div>
		
		<div class="fl_right">
		<p><a href ="https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=br.gov.sp.habitacao.cdhu" target="_blank"><img src="/img/img-botao-googleplay.jpg" border="0" /></a>Para dispositivos Android</p></div>
		
		
    </div>
