        <h1>
        
                
        <span>Getting Started » </span>
        Introduction
</h1>

                

        
<p>This is the Bolt Documentation. There are a lot of docs for Bolt, so it is split
up in a few sections. If you're getting started with Bolt or looking for
installation instructions, start with the first part. The second part of the
docs is about working <em>in</em> Bolt. Setting up ContentTypes, taxonomies, etc. The
third part is a reference for all things related to building your templates and
themes for Bolt. If you're just beginning with Bolt, don't forget to check out
our excellent Bolt Theming Tutorial as well.</p>
<p><a href="about" class="button large expand docsintro">
Getting Started<br>
<small>About Bolt, System Requirements, Installation and Upgrading.</small>
</a></p>
<p><a href="../cheatsheet" class="button large expand docsintro">
The Bolt cheatsheet<br>
<small>A great little reference for all things Bolt</small>
</a></p>
<p><a href="../contenttypes" class="button large expand docsintro">
ContentTypes<br>
<small>ContentTypes, records, fields, taxonomies, relationships, etc</small>
</a></p>
<p><a href="../templating/templates-routes" class="button large expand docsintro">
Templating / Theming<br>
<small>Writing templates, Twig, fetching content, paging, search</small>
</a></p>
<div class="docsintro">
    <!-- <a href="#" onclick="alert('Coming soon!');" class="button medium docsintro">
    Templating tutorial (soon!)<br>
    <small>Building a theme, step by step</small>
    </a> -->
    <a href="../internals" class="button medium docsintro">
    Bolt Internals<br><small>Contributing, coding standards</small>
    </a>
    <a href="../other/manifesto" class="button medium docsintro">
    Our manifesto<br><small>Keeping the community healthy!</small>
    </a>
    <a href="../howto" class="button medium docsintro">
    Other information<br><small>HOWTO's, Nut, and credits</small>
    </a>
</div>
<p><a href="../extensions/introduction" class="button large expand docsintro">
Extending Bolt<br>
<small>Writing extensions, submitting them to the marketplace</small>
</a></p>

        

        <div class="row" style="max-width: 680px;">
            <div class="large-6 columns">
                            </div>
            <div class="large-6 columns text-right">
                                                        <a class="button middle" href="/3.2/getting-started/about">
                        Next: <span>About Bolt</span> &raquo;
                    </a>
                            </div>
        </div>

        <div class="community-notice show-for-large">
            <hr>
            Couldn't find what you were looking for? We are happy to help you in the
            <a href="https://discuss.bolt.cm/" target="_blank">forum</a>, on
            <a href="http://slack.bolt.cm/" target="_blank">Slack</a> or on
            <a href="http://bolt.cm/irc" target="_blank">IRC</a>.<br>
            Spotted a typo, or have something to add?
            <a href="https://github.com/bolt/docs/blob/release/3.2/docs/getting-started/introduction.md" target="_blank">Edit this page on GitHub</a>.
        </div>


    </div>

    <div class="heading-block heading-block--center" id="c-headingBlock">
                    <h3 class="heading-block__heading h1">
                Learn how Hootsuite can make connecting with customers faster, smarter <span class="u-nowrap">and safer</span>
            </h3>
                            <h4 class="heading-block__subheading">
                
            </h4>
            </div>

                                        
    <div class="media-block" id="c-mediaBlock">
                                    <figure class="media-block__media media-block__media--right">
                    <img
                        src="/dist/images/stock/home/do-more.jpg"
                                                class="media-block__media__img"
                        alt="">
                </figure>
                            
            <div class="media-block__body media-block__body--left">
                                                    
                <h3 class="media-block__title">
                    Do more with social in <span class="u-nowrap">less time</span>
                </h3>
                <div class="media-block__desc">
                    Save time by managing all of your social media marketing efforts from a single dashboard. With Hootsuite&#39;s platform, you get the tools to manage all your social profiles and automatically find and schedule effective <span class="u-nowrap">social content.</span>
                </div>
                                                                                                                                                        </div>
            </div>
                    
    <div class="media-block" id="c-mediaBlock">
                                    <figure class="media-block__media media-block__media--left">
                    <img
                        src="/dist/images/stock/home/measure-roi.png"
                                                class="media-block__media__img"
                        alt="">
                </figure>
                            
            <div class="media-block__body media-block__body--right">
                                                    
                <h3 class="media-block__title">
                    Measure your <span class="u-nowrap">social ROI</span>
                </h3>
                <div class="media-block__desc">
                    Make smarter, data-driven social media marketing decisions with confidence. Hootsuite’s real-time analytics let you spot trends as they develop and drill down for insights on how your social content <span class="u-nowrap">is performing.</span>
                </div>
                                                                                                                                                        </div>
            </div>
                    
    <div class="media-block" id="c-mediaBlock">
                                    <figure class="media-block__media media-block__media--right">
                    <img
                        src="/dist/images/stock/home/protect-brand.jpg"
                                                class="media-block__media__img"
                        alt="">
                </figure>
                            
            <div class="media-block__body media-block__body--left">
                                                    
                <h3 class="media-block__title">
                    Protect your brand <span class="u-nowrap">on social</span>
                </h3>
                <div class="media-block__desc">
                    Improve your reputation while protecting your brand on social media by tracking messages and mentions. Hootsuite’s robust message approvals and permissions workflows cut internal risks. Profile protections and access controls guard against hackers and other <span class="u-nowrap">external threats.</span>
                </div>
                                                                                                                                                        </div>
            </div>

                </div>
            </section>

                        
    <aside class="cta-section cta-section--dark" id="c-ctaSection" >
                        <div class="cta-section__container container">
                                        
                            <h3 class="cta-section__heading h2">Start managing your social media faster, smarter, and safer</h3>
            
                                        
                            <div class="cta-section__cta">
                                            
                            
                                                                                        
                    
        
        
    <a class="btn cta-section__cta__btn btn--outline-light" href="/plans">
                Compare All Business Plans
    </a>

                </div>
            
                                                <div class="cta-section__secondary-cta">
                                                
                                
        
                    
        
        
    <a class="a cta-section__secondary-cta__a" href="/signup?planId=1">
                Get Started&mdash;Free
    </a>

                    </div>
                                    </div>
    </aside>

o(){"complete"===l.readyState&&i()}function i(){u("mark",["domContent",a()],null,"api")}function a(){return(new Date).getTime()}var function changePage(newLoc)
{
	nextPage = newLoc.options[newLoc.selectedIndex].value;
	if (nextPage != "") {
		document.location.href = nextPage;
	}
}

<li class="event2">12:00pm <a href="http://calendar.oregonstate.edu/201703311200/event/122078/" class="event" title="View event details">OSUsed Store Afternoon Sale</a></li>
<li class="event11">1:00pm <a href="http://calendar.oregonstate.edu/201703311300/event/122638/" class="event" title="View event details">Digital Marketing Boot Camp</a></li>
</ul>
		</td>
<td>&nbsp;</td>
	</tr>
	</tbody>
</table>
</div>
<!-- END MONTH VIEW -->

<script type="text/javascript">
   window.onload = function() {
        // CHANGE THIS WITH YOUR FUNCTION IF YOU WANT A CUSTOM FUNCTION
        parent.parent.insert_text(getParameter(document.location.href, "code"), true);
   }

   function getParameter(queryString, parameterName) {
        var parameterName = parameterName + "=";
        if(queryString.length > 0) {
            begin = queryString.indexOf(parameterName);
            if(begin != -1) {
                begin += parameterName.length;
                end = queryString.indexOf("&", begin);
                if(end == -1) {
                    end = queryString.length;
                }
                return unescape(queryString.substring(begin, end));
            }
            return "";
        }
   }

</script>

		jQuery(function() {

			});
		});
	</script>
